```{r}
library(readr)
homicide_dataset <- read_csv("homicide-data.csv")
homicide_dataset%>%
  group_by (city) %>%
  summarize(uid = n ()) %>%
  arrange(desc(uid))
   
```
Baltimore is in 4th place in the overall raw number of homicides in the dataset provided.
